properties.entry: SELECT WORKING ,SCHEDULE_TIME ,SCHEDULE_WEEK FROM SCHEDULE JOIN DOCTOR USING( DOCTOR_NO) WHERE DEPT_NAME = ?
SELECT DOCTOR_NO ,USER_NO ,HIRE_DATE ,DOCTOR_NAME ,LICENCE_NO ,DEPT_NAME FROM DOCTOR WHERE DEPT_NAME = ?
SELECT DOCTOR_NO , DOCTOR_NAME , LICENCE_NO , DEPT_NAME , HIRE_DATE , USER_SSN , PHONE , ADDRESS FROM DOCTOR JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE DOCTOR_NAME=?
SELECT DOCTOR_NO , DOCTOR_NAME , LICENCE_NO , DEPT_NAME , HIRE_DATE , USER_SSN , PHONE , ADDRESS FROM DOCTOR JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE DOCTOR_NO=?
SELECT DOCTOR_NO , DOCTOR_NAME , LICENCE_NO , DEPT_NAME , HIRE_DATE , USER_SSN , PHONE , ADDRESS FROM DOCTOR JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO)
